verses.verse: The <S%H1697>message<s%> that <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5374>Neriah,<s%> when he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> in a <S%H5612>book<s%> at the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

You <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H188>Woe<s%> is me <S%H3068>now!<s%> for Yahweh has <S%H3254>added<s%> <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> to my <S%H4341>pain;<s%> I am <S%H3021>weary<s%> with my <S%H585>groaning,<s%> and I <S%H4672>find<s%> no <S%H4496>rest.<s%>

You shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H1129>Behold,<s%> that which I have built will I break <S%H2040>down,<s%> and that which I have <S%H5193>planted<s%> I will pluck <S%H5428>up;<s%> and this in the whole <S%H776>land.<s%>

Do you <S%H1245>seek<s%> great <S%H1419>things<s%> for <S%H1245>yourself?<s%> Don't seek <S%H935>them;<s%> for, behold, I will bring <S%H7451>evil<s%> on all <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> but your <S%H5315>life<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> to you for a <S%H7998>prey<s%> in all <S%H4725>places<s%> where you <S%H3212>go.<s%>
